option-whisper-title:
sends Messages for dice rolls

Everyone :
the message is sent to all players

Game Master :
only the Game Master receives messages
defense-roll-title:
Resistance check
= 1d12

• if roll is greater than resistance :
 no malus

• if roll is less than of equal to the resistance :
 roll ≤ 6 : minor malus
 roll > 7 : major malus
main-dices-title:
= Skill + Field - Difficulty

• If Mastery is enable :
 = 4 - Difficulty
main-roll-title:
main check
= (Dices)d10
( only the higher dice is kept )

• if Dices is highter than 1:
 result = 1 : fumble
 2 ≤ result  ≤ 5 : failed
 6 ≤ result  ≤ 7 : light success
 8 ≤ result ≤ 9 : success
 success = 10 : critical success

• if Dices is lower than 2, a difficult situation appends :
 result = 1 : fumble
 2 ≤ result  ≤ 9 : failed
 result  = 10 : success
character-background-placeholder: Describe your character's origin and background
character-equipment-placeholder: content of the equipment, resources and shelters
rt-main-success-low: Successful, just by a little ... Take the stress
rt-main-critic:
Critical success!

Increase stress inflicted by one level
rt-resistance-malus-minor: Minor malus, remove all stress of this resistance
rt-resistance-malus-major: Major malus, remove all stress from all your resistances
